author: kayyagari
msg: o fixed an issue with deleting schema objects present in a schema having a upper/mixed case name
This issue pops up only after restarting the server after injecting a schema(with upper/mixed case name)
(see DIRSHARED-75 for an earlier fix for loading such schema)

author: dbaum
msg: listen on 127.0.0.1 by default; add --ip to specify listen address. FELIX-2767
